error.403.title: You are not allowed to view this page
error.404.title: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found
error.404.message: Please check your URL to ensure you are going where you intended. If everything looks OK and you still see this error page, please consider contacting the webmaster.
error.security.model.not.set: Could not perform the requested security action. There is no security model installed
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page. Please login using the form below.
error.validation.date.format: %value% is not in the right format
error.validation.image: Uploaded file is not a supported image
error.validation.image.height.max: The height of the image exceeds %height%px
error.validation.image.height.min: The height of the image is less then %height%px
error.validation.image.width.max: The width of the image exceeds %width%px
error.validation.image.width.min: The width of the image is less then %width%px
label.email.profile.description: Your email for password retrieval, notifications, ...
label.multiselect: Use CTRL to select more than one item or to deselect an item. Use SHIFT to select a range of items.
label.name.profile.description: The name used when mentioning your profile
label.password.old.description: Enter your old password to confirm the password change
label.password.new.description: Use a secure phrase, best to use a combination of numbers and letters, capitalized and not capitalized
label.password.confirm.description: Repeat your new password to make sure you didn't make any typos
label.unregister: To remove your account and all your profile data from our database, click unregister.
success.cache.cleared: The selected caches have been cleared
success.cache.enabled: The selected caches have been enabled
